title: tests: examples: shouldi: `urllib.error.HTTPError: HTTP Error 403: Forbidden`

labels.name: kind/ci/failing
labels.description: CI is currently failing due to one of these issues

body:
The shouldi tests are failing probably because urllib is being blocked during the `cached_download()` call. 

```
File "/home/runner/work/dffml/dffml/dffml/util/net.py", line 216, in cached_download
    protocol_allowlist=protocol_allowlist,
  File "/home/runner/work/dffml/dffml/dffml/util/net.py", line 151, in sync_urlretrieve_and_validate
    reporthook=progress_reporthook,
  File "/home/runner/work/dffml/dffml/dffml/util/net.py", line 131, in sync_urlretrieve
    return urllib.request.urlretrieve(url, **kwargs)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/urllib/request.py", line 247, in urlretrieve
    with contextlib.closing(urlopen(url, data)) as fp:
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/urllib/request.py", line 222, in urlopen
    return opener.open(url, data, timeout)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/urllib/request.py", line 531, in open
    response = meth(req, response)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/urllib/request.py", line 641, in http_response
    'http', request, response, code, msg, hdrs)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/urllib/request.py", line 569, in error
    return self._call_chain(*args)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/urllib/request.py", line 503, in _call_chain
    result = func(*args)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.7.10/x64/lib/python3.7/urllib/request.py", line 649, in http_error_default
    raise HTTPError(req.full_url, code, msg, hdrs, fp)
urllib.error.HTTPError: HTTP Error 403: Forbidden
```
This [thread at SO](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/16627227/http-error-403-in-python-3-web-scraping) might be useful.
